resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science & Bachelors of Engineering in Electrical Engineering with Honors
education.description: At Maryland I originally intended to graduate with just a bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering. Shortly after I started Electrical Engineering, I decided to pick up a minor in Computer Science as well, as the majority of engineering jobs that I saw or heard about required coding skills. Then, at the beginning of my senior year, while taking my first Algorithms course, I realized that my real passion was in Computer Science. So, I turned computer science into a second major and took a little of bit extra time to get both degrees.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Brian Handy must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
